name: Fried Green Olives Stuffed with Blue Cheese
source_file: Fried Green Olives Stuffed with Blue Cheese.txt
description: Crispy fried olives stuffed with blue cheese - a perfect appetizer.
ingredients: Oil for frying (enough to measure 1 inch depth)
Green olives, stuffed with blue cheese
instructions: Pour enough oil into a heavy large skillet to measure depth of 1 inch. Heat oil to 350Â°F.
Roll stuffed olives in flour, then in egg, then in breadcrumbs to coat.
Fry olives until golden brown, about 30 seconds.
Using slotted spoon, transfer olives to paper towels to drain.
notes: Recipe text appears to be partial - may be missing full ingredient quantities.
